Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Action & Adventure
Product Description: ['When an unannounced, uninvited and unwelcome family of fun-loving misfits converge upon a lakeside resort to join their relatives for a summer of relaxation, the result is anything but restful in this raucous comedy starring Dan Aykroyd and John Candy.It\'s a vacationer\'s worst nightmare, as wheeler-dealer Aykroyd, his sexually repressed wife and eerie twin daughters "join" the easygoing Candy and his straight-laced clan for a season of "fun" in the sun. Unfortunately, the only thing these two in-laws have in common is their intense dislike for each other. Soon, it\'s brother-in-law against brother-in-law in an uproarious and hilarious fight to the finish to see which one really knows how to enjoy The Great Outdoors.', 'Bonus Content:', 'Production Notes', 'Production Notes', 'Cast and Filmmakers', 'Cast and Filmmakers', 'Theatrical Trailer', 'Theatrical Trailer', ']]>']

reference_summary:
HOCUS POCUS
Bette Midler  (Actor),     Sarah Jessica Parker  (Actor),     Kenny Ortega  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Action & Adventure
['In Disney\'s HOCUS POCUS, Academy Award(R) nominee Bette Midler (Best Actress, 1991, FOR THE BOYS), stars with Sarah Jessica Parker (SEX AND THE CITY) and Kathy Najimy (THE WEDDING PLANNER) as three wild witches who return from seventeenth-century Salem for a night of zany fun and comic chaos. After they\'re conjured up by unsuspecting pranksters, the tricky trio sets out to cast a spell on the town and reclaim their youth. But first they must outwit three feisty kids determined to foil their scheme! Filled with bewitching laughs and magic, this hilarious film is perfect for the whole family!|Producer David Kirschner came up with the idea for the movie one night while he and his young daughter were sitting outside and his neighbor\'s black cat strayed by. Kirschner began to unspool a narrative of how the cat was once a boy who was changed into a feline 300 years ago by three witches.|Actress Kathy Najimy described her character Mary as "Eddie Haskell as a witch," referring to the character on the classic TV series "Leave It To Beaver." "She sucks up to Winifred [Bette Midler\'s character] every chance she gets. She wants to be part of the power club and Winifred\'s got the power."|To create the costumes, designer Mary Vogt read many historical books about Salem, Massachusetts. "I even read diaries of women who were hanged as witches," she says.']

Hocus Pocus DVD
A Quiet Place
Emily Blunt  (Actor),     John Krasinski  (Actor)    Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Horror
['If they hear you, they hunt you. In this terrifyingly suspenseful thriller, a family must navigate their lives in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound. Knowing that even the slightest whisper or footstep can bring death, Evelyn (Emily Blunt) and Lee (John Krasinski) Abbott are determined to find a way to protect their children at all costs while they desperately search for a way to fight back. Hailed by critics and audiences around the world, experience the must-see movie of the year.']

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interest in Family-Friendly Films**: The user continues to favor films suitable for family viewing, particularly enjoying light-hearted narratives with humor and magic.

- **Exploration of Diverse Genres**: Their recent purchase of a film outside of strictly family-friendly selections, alongside a comedy with nostalgic charm, highlights an openness to various genres. This includes a growing appreciation for both suspenseful storytelling and light-hearted comedies.

- **Nostalgic and Classic Content Appreciation**: The user's interest in nostalgic films tied to their childhood remains strong, demonstrating their affinity for classic stories, especially those featuring beloved actors.

- **Positive Engagement with Talented Actors**: They prioritize films with well-known talents, enjoying performances by iconic artists that enhance their viewing experience.

- **Emphasis on Quality and Affordability**: Their consistent feedback reflects a focus on obtaining good quality films that offer value for money, reinforcing their consumer preferences.

- **Support for Engaging Narratives**: The user maintains a preference for entertaining storytelling, whether whimsical or comedic, indicating a continued fascination with imaginative concepts and diverse narrative styles.

Overall, the user displays a broadening cinematic palette anchored in enchanting family-oriented content while also embracing comedy and well-crafted performances. Their recent interactions reaffirm their versatility in film enjoyment while staying rooted in nostalgic themes.
